TextView.android:text:
Control the snake as it moves around eating apples and increasing in length. Bonus green apples appear for only a few seconds and are double the value of red apples. Game is over when the snake runs into itself or a wall.

•	Classic Mode
Play any one of the 4 fields in typical classic snake style. There is no time limit on how long you can play and your goal is simply to achieve the highest score possible!

•	Extreme Mode
Time trial! You get 45 seconds to play each of the 4 fields, starting with the easiest – open field – and ending with the hardest – 4square. Your goal is to get as many points as possible within the 45 seconds on each field.

•	Scoring
Value of red apple increases with each apple the snake eats. The increase is dependent on the field being played:

Open Field = 10 points
Box = 15 points
Hole in the Wall = 20 points
4square = 25 points

Green apples are double the value of the red apple being shown at that point.

So, for example, if you are playing hole in the wall and 3 red apples have been eaten. The value of the next (4th) red apple will be (100 + 3*15) = 145. And value of the green apple will be 2*145 = 290.

If the red apple is consumed, total score = 100 + 115 + 130 + 145 = 490.
